mapper.select: select bkno, bkname, bkimg, bkwrite, bkprice, bkcate FROM books WHERE bkcate IN (SELECT b.bkcate FROM books b, trade t WHERE t.mid=#{mid} AND b.bkno = t.bkno)
select z.zno, b.bkname, b.bkimg, b.bkwrite, z.bkno, (select count(*) from zzim z where z.mid = #{mid}) as count from zzim z left join books b on z.bkno = b.bkno where z.mid = #{mid}
mapper.delete: delete from zzim where zno = #{del} and mid= #{mid}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.tno, t.bkno, b.bkimg, b.bkname, b.bkprice, t.tamount, t.tdate, t.tgroup, SUM(t.ttotal) OVER (PARTITION BY t.tgroup) AS total, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT tgroup) FROM trade WHERE mid = #{mid}) AS count FROM trade t LEFT JOIN books b ON t.bkno = b.bkno
t.mid = #{mid}
and t.tgroup like concat('%', #{searchV},'%') and b.bkname like concat('%', #{searchV},'%') and b.bkwrite like concat('%', #{searchV},'%')
order by t.tno desc

SELECT r.rno, r.bkno, b.bkwrite, b.bkimg, b.bkname, r.rsdate, r.rddate, r.rdel, (select count(*) from rental where mid = #{mid}) as count FROM rental r LEFT JOIN books b ON r.bkno = b.bkno
r.mid = #{mid}
and r.rsdate between DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) and NOW() and r.rsdate between DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) and NOW() and r.rsdate between DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) and NOW()
and b.bkname like concat('%', #{searchV},'%') and b.bkwrite like concat('%', #{searchV},'%')
order by r.rsdate desc

select b.bno, b.btitle, b.bcontent, DATE_FORMAT(b.bdate, '%y-%m-%d %h:%m') AS bdate, b.bcate, (select count(*) from board where mid = #{mid}) as count from board b join members m on b.mno = m.mno
m.mid = #{mid} and b.bdel = 1 and b.bcate = #{cate}
and b.btitle like concat('%', #{searchV},'%') and b.bcontent like concat('%', #{searchV},'%')
order by b.bno desc

select c.cno, c.comment, c.cdate, DATE_FORMAT(b.bdate, '%y-%m-%d %h:%m') AS bdate, b.bcate, b.btitle, (select count(*) from comments c join members m on c.mno = m.mno where mid = #{mid}) as count from comments c join members m on c.mno = m.mno join board b on c.bno = b.bno
m.mid = #{mid} and c.cdel = 1 and b.bcate = #{cate}
and b.btitle like concat('%', #{searchV},'%') and c.comment like concat('%', #{searchV},'%')
order by c.cno desc
select b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bdate, b.bread, m.mname from board b ,comments c, members m where c.cno = #{cno} and c.bno = b.bno and b.mno = m.mno
mapper.update: update members set mphone = #{phone} where mno = #{mno}
